Interface com.chimu.form.mapping.AssociationConnector

public interface AssociationConnector
An AssociationConnector is responsible for managing Associations via an external Association table whose rows specify links between objects. An AssociationConnector has pseudo-slots which are used to connect (during construction of the slot for the ObjectMapper) between an ExternalAssociationSlot and the ObjectRetriever at the other side of the association.

See Also:
ObjectMapper, ExternalAssociationSlot

Create a ConnectorSlot with an explicit retriever to fetch values for.
